  - title: "Drones and artificial intelligence show promise for conservation of farmland bird nests"
    excerpt: "Every spring, a large number of ground-nests of farmland birds are accidentally destroyed by mechanical operations, such as ploughing and sowing. A new study from the University of Helsinki shows for the first time that such nests can be located using a drone in combination with artificial intelligence."
    publishedDateTime: 2020-07-14T13:04:00Z
